linkedToNextExecute(Effect, GameManager, Player) - Method in class model.weapon.actions.DamageAction
method called after the end of an action to perform a linked action (referred to target previously chosen) It deals damage to the target already chosen in the former action
linkedToNextExecute(Effect, GameManager, Player) - Method in class model.weapon.actions.MarkAction
method called after the end of an action to perform a linked action (referred to target previously chosen) It deals marks to the prevoiusly selected target
linkedToNextExecute(Effect, GameManager, Player) - Method in class model.weapon.actions.MovementAction
method called after the end of an action to perform a linked action (referred to target previously chosen) It allows to have a movement related to the previously selected target
